description: A story in which the doctor in a small Cape Breton coal-mining community solves an emotional conflict as he administers to a boy whose hands have been mangled in a needless accident. Based on an excerpt from the Hugh MacLennan novel Each Man's Son. Cast: Tom McBride, Jack Zolov (Award: Yorkton)
